Paragraph.Text: The PCB Assembling Plant is a regular conveyor fitted with a machine for manufacturing printed circuit boards from Coils of wire, and behaves like a Conveyor in all circumstances.
Feed coils into the PCB Assembling Plant, ideally directly from aa Coiler Plant. The PCB Assembling Plant will convert the coils into PCBs which can be used in additional recipies.
The PCB Assembling Plant is essential for the automation of Laboratory Research.
